page.title: 01The Landscape
page.content: The main features of our area are grassland and forest.Our community is scattered,with farms and houses dotted around.It is beautiful and picturesque with lovely views of the Severn Valley.The highest point is an old Celtic Fort,Beacon Ring, 1,338 feet above sea level.Welshpool is the nearest market town,famous for its smithfield,which lies NW of Leighton .Powis Castle is prominent on the western edge of Welshpool.Many of us live near Offa's Dyke path and many tourists walk along it.A Roman road crosses our area,and drovers used it regularly in the last century taking cattle to markets in England.The Welsh Harp Inn is still there today. We like living in a rural area because it is quieter than living in towns,and life is interesting so close to nature in the different seasons.
